commands.npm: npm install @lucide/astro tailwind-merge clsx && npm astro add tailwind
commands.pnpm: pnpm add @lucide/astro tailwind-merge clsx && pnpm astro add tailwind
commands.yarn: yarn add @lucide/astro tailwind-merge clsx && yarn astro add tailwind
commands.bun: bun add @lucide/astro tailwind-merge clsx && bun astro add tailwind
